name: Get lost in Sai Gon with me!
description: Hello, my name is Tran, now am living and working in Sai gon. Am an architect- interior designer. So that, am not a saigonese, my eyes when introduce Sai Gon with you for sure will very different, you will see a beautiful Sai gon under my eyes, explore some place you never think, know about architecture- interior design- food- people- life style with me.
